archimate:BusinessRole.name: Project Manager
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: "Project Managers lead the project delivery and manage contract and scope. In our project based company, Project Managers have a key role in making customers more competitive, ensuring profitable business for Tieto and creating great customer experience every day with the project team. They lead the project delivery and key responsibilities include managing the contract, project scope, budget, schedule and risks. At the more experienced levels the Project Manager leads large and complex projects; at the starting levels Project Managers may be concerned with clearly identifiable elements or functions within a larger project. Typically Project Managers are working towards or have achieved certification in project management.
